TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationIdleEventArgs extends System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs

summary.span: 保留成為閒置狀態之工作流程執行個體的相關資訊。

span.span: Holds information about the workflow instance that has become idle.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查傳遞給 執行個體之 處理常式的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此範例中，處於閒置狀態的工作流程具有一個名為 且由名為 `EnterGuess` 之活動所擁有的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 此程式碼範例為基礎的[如何： 執行工作流程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md)，這屬於[入門教學課程 [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md). 如果該步驟中的 處理常式修改為包含此範例中的程式碼，就會顯示下列輸出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bookmarks As ReadOnlyCollection(Of BookmarkInfo)

summary.span: 取得工作流程執行個體的書籤唯讀集合。

span.span: Gets the read-only collection of bookmarks for the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查傳遞給 執行個體之 處理常式的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此範例中，處於閒置狀態的工作流程具有一個名為 且由名為 `EnterGuess` 之活動所擁有的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 此程式碼範例為基礎的[如何： 執行工作流程](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md)，這屬於[入門教學課程 [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md). 如果該步驟中的 處理常式修改為包含此範例中的程式碼，就會顯示下列輸出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]
